#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

int main() {
    int test,k;
    string n;
    cin >> test;
    while(test--) {
        cin >> n >> k;
        long long int len=n.length();
        long long int i,ans=0,x;
        for(i=0;i<len;i++) {
            x=ans*10+n[i]-'0';
            ans=x%k;
        }
        if(!ans)
            cout << "YES\n";
        else
            cout << "NO\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
